name: Small Town Emo (DEMO)
description:
Experience peak 2007 cringe, with Small Town Emo for GameBoy!

Play as Ken, an emo teen with an awkward crush on his best friend, Fergus. Can you get your chemical romance sorted in a single saturday?

DEMO AVAILABLE NOW!

xXx_St0ry_xXx

Set the weekend before Halloween in 2007, Small Town Emo follows the story of Ken, a seventeen year old emo with a crush on his goofy best friend; Fergus.

In the lead up to a costume party, Ken spends the day trying to find the courage to confess his feelings (and taking every opportunity to avoid doing so).

Can Ken figure things out, or is he doomed to have depressing song lyrics as his MSN Messenger status ‘til the end of time?

xXx_FeaTuReZ_xXx
  • 4 mind-boggling colours!
  • 8 mouthwateringly hilarious collectible memes!
  • 97% pure walking & talking - no pesky action!
  • Priceless minigames, including "bullet hell" and "pimple popper"!
  • Engaging cutscenes - ranging from quickly drawn to poorly drawn!
  • Immersive simulated MSN Messenger sequences!
  • Hand-picked, curated, and faithfully recreated fanfiction tropes!
  • An interactive time capsule featuring gratuitous dated references!
  • Complete linearity, only the vaguest illusion of choice!
xXx_cOnTRols_xXx MOVE[ARROW KEYS] or [WASD]INTERACT[Z] or [SPACE]
CANCEL[X]MENU[ENTER] or [SHIFT]
